item.title: Which programming language should I learn?
item.description: Do I spend time learning a new programming language or do I focus on mastering the one I already know?

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Welcome to my site! This is a placeholder for the About Me page. Here you can share information about yourself, your background, interests, and anything else you’d like visitors to know.

Feel free to update this page with your own story!
